arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Rayo Vallecano 3 - 3 Real Madrid; 2024 La Liga
arts.sum: Lucas Vazquez—3: Continues to struggle defensively, with poor communication between the backline and midfield on the first goal conceded. Rodrygo—8.5: Up there with Jude Bellingham for man of the match on the Madrid side.
Real Madrid hit out at the referee's failure to award them a penalty in the club's 3-3 LaLiga draw at Rayo Vallecano on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti: “The penalty seems very clear to me on replay”
arts.sum: “Because he played 90 minutes the other day, he had a good game.” Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti spoke to the media after the team’s 3-3 draw with Rayo Vallecano on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Rayo Vallecano 3 - 3 Real Madrid, La Liga 2024 - 2025
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani discusses: Kiyan blitzes through all of Real Madrid’s issues in the 3 -3 draw in Vallecas

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti claims officials missed ‘very clear penalty’ for Real Madrid vs Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has revealed his take that his side were denied what should have been a clear-cut penalty in the club’s meeting with Rayo Vallecano. Real,…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid miss chance to go top after six-goal thriller with Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: Rayo quickly led 2-0 before Los Blancos turned it round to go 3-2 up in the second half, only for Isi Palazon to equalise and earn a point.

arts.ttl: Rayo Vallecano 3-3 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as attackers shine and frail defences falter
arts.sum: Real Madrid spurn the chance to move top of La Liga as they are held 3-3 by Rayo Vallecano in a thrilling six-goal encounter on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid held to draw at Rayo Vallecano in La Liga
arts.sum: Rayo set a fast pace and stunned the powerhouse with two headed goals from Unai López and Abdul Mumin headers to lead 2-0 by the 36th minute. Federico Valverde struck with a powerful shot from well outside the area to pull one back for Madrid then Jude Bellingham headed the visitors level from a pass by Rodrygo just before halftime.

arts.ttl: Arda Güler makes Real Madrid history in meeting with Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: Real Madrid youngster Arda Güler has on Saturday evening secured for himself a piece of Blancos history. As much comes owing to his exploits in the club’s meeting with Rayo…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid star triples his career La Liga assist tally vs Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: A leading member of the attacking ranks at La Liga giants Real Madrid has on Saturday evening managed to triple his assist tally for the entire campaign. The player in…
